it.polimi.se2019.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientView, PlayerView

    public abstract class View
extends Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    Common class between Client View and Remote View. Observer of network handler and model. Observable by network handler and controller.
    Author:
    Galli, Fortina
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
